112 int _start_index; // Position to start from when getting search results 113 int _filter; // turn on or off duplicate content 114 int _c2coff; // turn on or off Simplified and Traditional Chinese Search 115 int _date_restrict; // Whether to restrict search based on dates. "1" for yes and "0" for no 116 117 std::string _extra_query; // Extra queries to include in the search terms 118 std::string _exact_terms; // A phrase that all documents in the search results must contain 119 std::string _exclude_terms; // A word or phrase that should not appear in any documents in the search results 120 std::string _site_search; // A given site which should always be included or excluded from results. Based on *_site_search_filter* 121 std::string _site_search_filter; // Whether to Include or exclude the sites specified in *_site_search* 122 std::string _link_site; // Specifies that all search results should contain a link to a particular URL 123 std::string _or_terms; // Provides additional search terms to check for in a document, where each document in the search results must contain at least one of the additional search terms 124 std::string _date_restrict_type; // Restricts results to URLs based on date. In format dateType[number]. Example: m3 restricts to past 3 months 125 std::string _low_range; // query terms to append before the search query 126 std::string _high_range; // query terms to append after the search query 127 std::string _search_type; // Specifies the search type: image. If unspecified, results are limited to webpages 128 std::string _filetype; // Restricts results to files of a specified extension 129 std::string _rights; // Filters based on licensing 130 std::string _img_size; // Returns images of a specified size 131 std::string _img_type; // Returns images of a type 132 std::string _img_color_type; // Returns black and white, grayscale, transparent, or color images 133 std::string _img_dominant_color; // Returns images of a specific dominant color 134 std::string _language; // Language to search google in 135 std::string _interface_language; // Sets the user interface language 136 std::string _user_country; // Country to search from in google 137 std::string _result_country; // Country to search for in google 138 std::string _safe; // Whether to show explicit results. 139 std::string _sort; // Return results in specific order 140 141 std::string _search_terms; // Query to search for on google 142 std::string _search_url; // Google Custom Search url 143 std::string _json_file; // Name of the file to save response data 144 std::string _env_file; // Name of the file that contains Google Search API and CX keys 145 146 // Class Public Functions 147 180 GoogleSearch( 181 const std::string search_terms, // Query to search for on google 182 183 const int num_results, // Results to return for the search 184 const int start_index, // Position to start from when getting search results 185 const int filter, // turn on or off duplicate content 186 const int c2coff, // turn on or off Simplified and Traditional Chinese Search 187 const int date_restrict, // Whether to restrict search based on dates. "1" for yes and "0" for no 188 189 const std::string extra_query, // Extra queries to include in the search terms 190 const std::string exact_terms, // A phrase that all documents in the search results must contain 191 const std::string exclude_terms, // A word or phrase that should not appear in any documents in the search results 192 const std::string site_search, // A given site which should always be included or excluded from results. Based on *_site_search_filter* 193 const std::string site_search_filter, // Whether to Include or exclude the sites specified in *_site_search* 194 const std::string link_site, // Specifies that all search results should contain a link to a particular URL 195 const std::string or_terms, // Provides additional search terms to check for in a document, where each document in the search results must contain at least one of the additional search terms 196 const std::string date_restrict_type, // Restricts results to URLs based on date. In format dateType[number]. Example: m3 restricts to past 3 months 197 const std::string low_range, // query terms to append before the search query 198 const std::string high_range, // query terms to append after the search query 199 const std::string search_type, // Specifies the search type: image. If unspecified, results are limited to webpages 200 const std::string filetype, // Restricts results to files of a specified extension 201 const std::string rights, // Filters based on licensing 202 const std::string img_size, // Returns images of a specified size 203 const std::string img_type, // Returns images of a type 204 const std::string img_color_type, // Returns black and white, grayscale, transparent, or color images 205 const std::string img_dominant_color, // Returns images of a specific dominant color 206 const std::string language, // Language to search google in. Defualt is 'English' 207 const std::string interface_language, // Sets the user interface language 208 const std::string user_country, // Country to search from in google 209 const std::string result_country, // Country to search for in google 210 const std::string safe, // Whether to show explicit results. 211 const std::string sort, // Return results in specific order 212 213 const std::string json_file, // Name of the json file to store search result 214 const std::string env_file // Name of the env that contains Google Search API and CX Keys 215 );
